arts.ttl: Ollie Watkins keeps Aston Villa’s Champions League hopes alive with record goal
arts.sum: Watkins touched home Morgan Rogers’ cross to move on to 75 top-flight strikes for Villa – one more than Gabriel Agbonlahor.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth v Villa team news: Kluivert benched
arts.sum: Three changes for the Cherries, four for Villa The post Bournemouth v Villa team news: Kluivert benched appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth v Aston Villa: Premier League – live
arts.sum: Premier League updates from the 5.30pm BST kick-off Live scores | Tables | Golden Boot race | And mail Scott Bournemouth make three changes to the team that started the 2-1 win at Arsenal this time last weekend. Antoine Semenyo, Alex Scott and captain Adam Smith return to the starting line-up; Julián Araujo and Justin Kluivert drop to the bench, while Dango Ouattara is injured. Aston Villa make four changes after their 1-0 victory over Fulham last Saturday. Tyrone Mings, Jacob Ramsey, Lucas Digne and Amadou Onana are back; Pau Torres, Ian Maatsen and captain John McGinn drop to the bench, while last weekend’s goalscoring hero Youri Tielemans is out for the season. Continue reading...
